text: neohuiga geudeul-ege guhana geu deul-eun deudji moshal geos-imyeo geudeul-i deul eossda hadeolado neohuiui guwon-e eung hal su eobsnola simpan-ui nal geudeul-eun geudeul-i hananimgwa biyuhayeo sungbaehaess deon geosdeul-eul geoyeoghal geos-ila modeun geos eul algo gyesineun geubuncheoleom geudaeegejinlileul malhal ja amudo eobsnola
